Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add superadmin system and dynamic site settings

- Add is_superadmin column to users table
- Create site_settings table for dynamic configuration
- Add /admin page for superadmin management
- Add API routes for settings and superadmin management
- Update Edge Function to read settings from database with caching
- Add client-side retry queue for rate-limited verifications
- Show wait confirmation dialog if estimated wait > 3 minutes

Settings include: gemini_model, rate limits (per-minute, per-hour, global)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
